branchCategory.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch, Flange 32A ~ 50A
branchCategory.description: <p>The updated VXD series is a pilot operated, 2 port solenoid valve. The new VXD is not only smaller, but uses less power compared to the previous version. Available in brass and stainless steel, the VXD series also offers low concentration ozone resistant and oil free options. Flow rate ranges from Cv of 1.9 to 49.</p>
